EmailTemplate.name: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement (1338824877.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement (1338824877.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE NO WAY. That is so funny, I was on On Point as well a LONG time ago before I was married. I called in about MySpace and the fact I met my soon to be husband on the site (this is dating me I know.) How funny good ol Tom Ashbrook! I really enjoy his show and I cant believe we were both on it  small world!! From: jmmcmillin@comcast.net [mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net] Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2012 1:37 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Sounds good and enjoy your weekend. The show btw was On Point. I asked him why actors do not take chances in their characters any more, Hollywood seems so rehashed. I am a NPR junkie as well.
good night
From: "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "john Mcmillin" <jmmcmillin@comcast.net <mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net>> Sent: Friday, June 1, 2012 4:41:23 PM Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO AgreementI LOVE NPR! Which show was it?! I am a total junkie! Just give me a call next week and we can catch up Game of Thrones season finally this weekend! J ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: john Mcmillin [mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net] <mailto:[mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net]> Sent: Friday, June 01, 2012 2:40 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement I agree Sara and I am open to finding ways to grow with MBO. I have at least two more clients that would like to receive a similar contract. Let me know when you have some time to discuss how MBO handles growth strategy for new startups.I do not know if you are a Billy bob Thornton fan but I got to speak to him this morning on NPR, he was a guest on a show I listen to in the morning, it was awesome! Anyway, enjoy your weekend of Throne adventures and please let me know how we can continue to work together as I grow. Regards, John From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Friday, June 01, 2012 9:28 AM To: john Mcmillin Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Hi John, That sounds great and you are very welcome  I am happy to help you but remember its a partnership! J ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. From: john Mcmillin [mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net] <mailto:[mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net]> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 10:34 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Ok, I will ask Frank to sign the paperwork tomorrow morning and send it over and thank you for putting it together so quickly. I have another group that I am working with that is similar to this client. I can send you over the SOW and changes in compensation if that is ok? Thank you for your help on this project Sara and let me know your thoughts on growing my services to other prospective partners. Sincerely, John From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 4:58 PM To: john Mcmillin Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Hi John, All he sent me was the adjustment to the rates but I will keep an eye out for other adjustments Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: john Mcmillin [mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 5:47 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Hi Sara and happy Thursday, I was curious if Frank sent you back the adjustments on the contract. I saw Frank yesterday so something should be coming your way. Thanks Sara. From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 2:44 PM To: john Mcmillin Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Hi John, Sounds good. He should be able to adjust the SOW since it is word format. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: john Mcmillin [mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 1:31 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Sara, Frank is going to adjust the commission % from being based on enrollment and not the gross value. Thank you Sara. From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 11:31 AM To: john Mcmillin Subject: FW: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Hi John, I clarified things with Frank and he is fine with working with MBO. He did have a question about the rate and said it was different than what you two had discussed and he asked you to give him a call. Once you two work that out let me know if there needs to be any changes made to the SOW (attached) and I will send the update. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 12:29 PM To: 'Frank Wilkens' Cc: dgeorge@wellcity.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:dgeorge@wellcity.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Hi Frank, So nice speaking with you and clarifying MBOs relationship and role in this agreement with Well City and John. I will have John reach out separately to discuss the rate. If you have any questions about our MSA please let me know. Again, I would be happy to work with your agreement if that is preferable to Well City. Also, I would be happy to list Well City as holder on our certificate of insurance once the contract is signed. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Frank Wilkens [mailto:fwilkens@wellcity.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:fwilkens@wellcity.com%5d&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 12:17 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: dgeorge@wellcity.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:dgeorge@wellcity.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement John is already a 1099 contractorif he wishes to hire your firm to assist him in managing his business; please direct any contracts to him as he would be your client not Wellcity. Frank From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 10:21 AM To: dgeorge@wellcity.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:dgeorge@wellcity.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Cc: fwilkens@wellcity.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:fwilkens@wellcity.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>; john Mcmillin Subject: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Importance: High Dear David, My name is Sara and I am a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Your name was forwarded to me by John McMillin. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. Attached is the standard agreement and statement of work we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVxUtkp%2F5%2FCQLInukDjDe4u89bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
